channel.title: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install
channel.description:
Hi, I've searched to see if anyone else has experienced this problem but no luck so far.
I downloaded the installation files via a torrent no problem, but upon double clicking the setup.exe to start the installation I get a message saying 'The version of this file is not compatible with the version of Windows you're running. Check your computer systems information to see whether you need an x86 (32-bit) or x64 (64-bit) version of the program, and then contact the software publisher.
I am running Windows 7 Home Premium 64 bit version, but have no problem installing any other games, Steam or otherwise.
Is Black Mesa 32 bit windows only? Surely not - I understood that it would play on any Steam compatible system.
Can anyone advise what might be going on here, and anything I can try?
Thanks

item.title: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install
item.dc:creator: SykoPyro
item.description:
Yeah, I just finished playing it on Windows Home Edition x64.

Read full topic

item.title: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install
item.dc:creator: glwillia
item.description:
I downloaded and installed (and ran) it just fine on Windows 7 Enterprise x64.

Read full topic
item.source: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install

item.title: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install
item.dc:creator: SykoPyro
item.description:
Also: try re-downloading the setup file (you dont need to redownload the .7z file).

If all else fails, install it manually.

Go here: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods
create a folder called ‘BMS’ then put all of the files inside the BMS folder from the .7z file. Restart steam, Black Mesa should appear in your library.

Read full topic
item.source: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install

item.title: 'Not compatible with version of Windows' Error Message on install

item.description:
there shouldnt be any problems, even if blackmesa is 32bit. try running the installer as a administrator.

Read full topic
